newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigeria police kill six robbery suspects in Lagos.
newsitem.headline: Nigeria police kill six robbery suspects in Lagos.

text.p: Police in Lagos shot dead six armed robbery suspects and arrested 11 others including a woman and a police inspector, the state news agency reported on Thursday.
Lagos state police commissioner Abubakar Tsav said the incident on Wednesday followed the discovery of an armoury used by the gang and equipped by the arrested inspector.
Armed robbery is common in impoverished and populous Nigeria where the penalty for the offence is death by firing squad.
In Lagos, the military authorities have launched "operation sweep" to fight crime. "Any arrested robber, no matter who he is would be treated as a robber," Tsav told the News Agency of Nigeria.
